vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κεντορίων, ωνος, ὁ,
= Latin centurio, [Refs]:—also κεντουρίων, [Refs 6th c.AD+]; κεντυρίων, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: centurion, technically the commander of one hundred
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
centurion, technically the commander of one hundred
in its original signification, a commander of a hundred foot-soldiers, a centurion, Mk. 15:39, 44, 45*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: centurión (oficial romano al mando de alrededor de cien hombres)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 百夫長, 古羅馬指揮百名士兵的軍官 ( 可 15:39, 15:44-45)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 百夫长, 古罗马指挥百名士兵的军官 ( 可 15:39, 15:44-45)
